story: Once upon a time, there was a spy whose name was Jon Snow. Jon Snow was a King from the House Targaryen. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the peace of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Eddard Stark to seek help. Eddard Stark was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Moat Cailin at the Winter Solstice, Jon Snow met Benjen Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Jon Snow with the help of Benjen Stark finally found Petyr Baelish in Moat Cailin. A bloody battle begun but Jon Snow thanks to invisibility powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. After the victory, the freedom was not under treat anymore. Jon Snow and Benjen Stark celebrated in Bear Island with making fireworks
